page.title: 15A SCHOOLGIRL'S DAY
page.content: I get up at 7 o'clock and go downstairs to have breakfast, which is egg,bacon,fried bread and mushrooms. Then I have a grapefruit. Afterwards I wash and dress, then take my dog, Goldie, for a walk. I help my dad chop kindling for our fire which I light, then I have a break for coffee at 10 o'clock, while I watch some television. After lunch I help my mum to wash up, then I get ready to go pony riding at Keswick near Norwich. I get back home about 5 o'clock when I have tea, take my dog for another walk, watch television and go to bed.
